name: Arrow Swap
description:
Just a quick prototype to test out the arrow-swapping mechanic. May add more levels and mechanics later, we'll see. This is my first stab at making a puzzle game, so feedback is welcome!

Controls:

Arrows to move the cursor, X or Space to swap. Z to undo, R to reset the level.

On mobile: swipe to move, tap to swap/confirm. Pinch to bring up the menu for Undo/Reset/Quit.

Rules:

Move the cursor to select the arrow you want to swap. Arrow will move and swap with another arrow or a gem in that direction. Beat the levels by matching all three gems in a line.
